name: Whiteboard: Sticky Notes & Flow Chart Arrows
description:
Whiteboard can be used as a library or a template file for remote workshops, brainstorms, and co-design sessions.


Inside the file you will find:

  • 6 types of sticky notes. A sticky note can contain either a title, a body text, a todo-list or a combination of them.
  • 12 paper colors. Customize your sticky notes with different colors.
  • 24 types of arrows. Connect your sticky notes, wireframes or other blocks to create a flowchart.


Sketch and Adobe XD versions are available here:

http://kotomanov.com/download/whiteboard


If you like this template, feel free to Buy Me a Coffee.


What's new

Update 2021-04-05

Variants for TODO lists


Update 2020-10-17

  1. Auto layout support
  2. Todo-lists
